name: Neural bOts
description:
Firstly, we are already working on the full game and it will have awesome map builder for you to make and share your work so stay tuned.

You are a neural bot, that is trying to get through the level. The game has got an online feature. You can see other people, but you can't interact with them physically. There is an online highscore system as well.

P.S. This is the game jam version so there are bugs , 

FB: https://www.facebook.com/daBeKka/
